channel.title: Throne of Lies Anonymous
channel.description: Hi, my name is Charlie... and i'm a Throne of Lies addict. I sometimes binge play for 8-10 hours a day. Every time i say it'll be my last game for the day. But the excitement of starting a new game and getting a (hopefully) new class is too much. Sometimes even if i dont wanna play, i'll play anyway because i like doodling on deathnotes. does anybody else... care to share their story?

item.description:
Hi, my name is Charlie… and i’m a Throne of Lies addict. I sometimes binge play for 8-10 hours a day. Every time i say it’ll be my last game for the day. But the excitement of starting a new game and getting a (hopefully) new class is too much. Sometimes even if i dont wanna play, i’ll play anyway because i like doodling on deathnotes. does anybody else… care to share their story?
